titleStmt.title: The history of the Church of Great Britain from the birth of Our Saviour, untill the year of Our Lord, 1667 : with an exact succession of the bishops, and the memorable acts of many of them : together with an addition of all the English cardinals, and the several orders of English monks, friars, and nuns, in former ages.
titleStmt.author: Gearing, William.
Geaves, William.
Geaves, George.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to William Gearing by Wing.
Sometimes attributed to William Geaves and George Geaves.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
